io.confluent.ksql.config

Interface ConfigItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigItem.Resolved, ConfigItem.Unresolved

    public interface ConfigItem

    • Method Detail

      • isResolved

        boolean isResolved()
        Returns:
        true is this is a known, resolved config.

      • getPropertyName

        java.lang.String getPropertyName()
        Returns:
        the name of the property.

      • parseValue

        java.lang.Object parseValue(java.lang.Object value)
        Parse and validate the value for this config item.

        Parsing and validating is done by the underlying ConfigDef, where known. For unresolved items the value passes through as-is.

        Parameters:
        value - the raw item to parse.
        Returns:
        the parsed and validated value.

      • convertToString

        java.lang.String convertToString(java.lang.Object value)
        Convert the supplied value to a String.

        Passwords are obfuscated. For unresolved items the value is converted to a String.

        Parameters:
        value - the value of the property.
        Returns:
        the obfuscated value.

      • isDefaultValue

        boolean isDefaultValue(java.lang.Object value)
        Checks if the supplied value is the default value for the config item.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to check
        Returns:
        true if it is, false otherwise.

      • resolved

        static ConfigItem resolved(org.apache.kafka.common.config.ConfigDef.ConfigKey key)

      • unresolved

        static ConfigItem unresolved(java.lang.String propertyName)
